name: Dwarf
blurb: Short-statured craftsmen known for their fondness of iron and ale.
racePowerDesc: Once per battle as a free action after you have been hit by an enemy attack that did not drop you to 0 hp or below, you can heal using a recovery. If the escalation die is less than 2, you only get half the usual healing from the recovery. You must roll this recovery, you cannot take the average.
